Zak Grant

Who Am I?

Web Developer / Programmer

BIO

My name is Zak Grant. I'm a software developer out of the Grand Rapids, MI area. I love working in all types of different languages and I really enjoy learning new ones as well.

Front-End Development

Whether I'm working in Angular, React, or just good old fashioned HTML, I love working in the front-end. This also extends to CSS, utilizing different front-end CSS libraries such as Bootstrap, Materialize, as well as integrating tools such as SASS.

Back-End Development

Where the real power is, is in back-end development. I love working with both .net Core 2.1, as well the JavaScript based framework Express.js. Going beyond this, I have worked a bit in both Mongo and Sql.
